org.diylc.presenter
Class DrawingManager

java.lang.Object
  org.diylc.presenter.DrawingManager

public class DrawingManager
extends java.lang.Object

Utility that deals with painting Project on the Graphics2D and keeps areas taken by each drawn component.

Author:
Branislav Stojkovic
